slide-1.title: How to Play
content: 48D is similar to a ball game inside a cage, much like roulette. You simply need to predict the ball with a number between 1 and 48 that will appear as the result.

slide-2.title: Placing Bets
content: You can place various types of bets, such as odd/even, big/small, split, corner, line bets, column bets, etc.

slide-3.title: How to Play
content: The result is determined after the ball spins inside the cage and stops, and any bets that match the result will win.
